attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think everyone should sign this to encourage Mr. Brown to restore some faith and put a complete STOP to greedy MP's expenses. What do they get a salary for then? Any normal person would have to move at their own expense to a decent job..!! Britain should not be subsidising their lifestyles!!!!!!!!!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
